snippet: The Supreme Court ruled unanimously Tuesday that any rape victim can get an abortion, setting a historic precedent in a country where most abortions are illegal.
abstract: Argentina's Supreme Court unanimously rules that any rape victim can get an abortion, setting a historic precedent in a country where most abortions are illegal.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court ruled unanimously Tuesday that any rape victim can get an abortion, setting a historic precedent in a country where most abortions are illegal.

headline.main: Argentina: Court Allows Abortion for Rape Victims
headline.print_headline: Argentina: Court Allows Abortion for Rape Victims
